meta.description: Optimize coal distribution from two mines to three residential areas to minimize transportation cost in ton-kilometers.

params.name: supply
params.description: Minimum supply of coal from each mine in tons

params.name: demand
params.description: Coal demand of each residential area in tons

params.name: distance
params.description: Distance in kilometers from each mine to each residential area

vars.name: x
vars.description: Amount of coal transported from each mine to each residential area in tons

objective.name: min_total_ton_kilometers
objective.expr: sum(x[m][a] * distance[m][a] for m in MINES for a in AREAS)
objective.description: Minimize the total transportation cost in ton-kilometers

constraints.name: supply_constraint_A
constraints.description: Mine A must supply at least 80 tons

constraints.name: supply_constraint_B
constraints.description: Mine B must supply at least 100 tons
